bullish: double-digit growth across every major part of the business
delivered our first ever $100 billion quarter
strong momentum in Search, YouTube ads, subscription, platforms and devices in Cloud
Cloud backlog grew 46% quarter-over-quarter to $155 billion
crossed $300 million paid subscriptions led by growth in Google One and YouTube Premium
AI is driving an expansionary moment for Search
AI Mode is resonating well with users
YouTube has remained #1 in streaming watch time in the U.S. for more than 2 years
bearish: increase in depreciation expense and other data center operations costs
volatility in exchange rates could affect the impact of FX on Q4 revenues
year-over-year comparisons in advertising will be negatively impacted by the strong spend on U.S. elections in the fourth quarter of 2024
risks: risks and uncertainties that could cause actual results to differ materially from current expectations and assumptions
increasing competition in the technology industry
regulatory risks, including the European Commission fine
